title: Swiss Federal Railways
content:
Fellow Typomen,

I’m currently looking for the manual of the Swiss Federal Railways made by our hero Jozef Müller-Brockmann.  
I’m sure it should be somewhere on the internet but google didn’t help me very much!  
Anyone knows where to find it?

Loyalty, friendship, commitment

 [‹ URGENT: Why buy Helvetica in Open Type over TT or Postscript?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906234919/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19061 "Go to previous forum topic") [TYPE BATTLE: Week 10 (3 April) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906234919/http:/www.typophile.com/battle10 "Go to next forum topic")
author: condorito

comments.content:
i havent found it until now, if you find it, please leave a note here. as you surely know there are some parts of it in books about brockmann, but thats not what you want.

if i get some free time (after a stressy period ending end of april), i’ll try to call the SBB (swiss federal railways in german) and ask if they’d know any place i could still find it (archives, whatever). but probably they wont have anything.
